structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: At the first meeting of the commission after January 1 of each year, the commission shall elect a chair, vice chair, and secretary from among the appointed members to fill regular terms. A majority of the members shall constitute a quorum.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 171, sec. 5.
